Packages
GPS_Reader The package consists of the classes which is related to the GPS and processes the information The package contains CoordinateProcessor.java : to process the coordinates and return the correct result, GpsConnector.java : to connect to the GPS by port and get the information, and NMEAProcessor.java : to process the information given by GpsConnector.java.
GUI The packages consists of the classes which provide Graphical User Interface for the user showing map and first loading screen are involved with this package.
Logic The package contains of the logic classes of the software, The classes which would be the brain of the software are in this package
Logic.History A package to keep the classes of history, For Example, save and load class of user passed ways
Logic.SearchEngine The package contains the main search class which has association with manual and API search classes
Logic.SearchEngine.API The package contains the classes which use JXMapViewer API to show the best way on the screen
Logic.SearchEngine.Manual The package contains the classes which use manual Dijkstra search based written by Amir, Mozhan to show the best way on the screen
Logic.SearchEngine.Manual.Comparator The package contains the classes which use manual comparators for the dijkstra for example if the user want to go by bike or on foot
Logic.XMLReader A package which contains the classes to read the relevant .XML files
Sound The package consists of the classes which makes the sounds of the software.
